Class Raytracer.ParameterControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • Raytracer.ParameterControl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Raytracer.FloatParameter, Raytracer.ListParameter, Raytracer.Vector3Parameter
    Enclosing class:
    Raytracer

    public abstract class Raytracer.ParameterControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for a dynamically generated GUI control.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParameterControl

        ParameterControl​(java.lang.String labelText,
                 java.lang.Object obj,
                 java.lang.String fieldName)
        Creates a ParameterControl.
        Parameters:
        labelText - the text displayed beside the control.
        obj - the object that contains the field to be controlled.
        fieldName - the name of the field on the object that this should control.

      • createGUIControls

        public abstract int createGUIControls​(g4p_controls.GWindow window,
                                      int x,
                                      int y)
        Creates and draws the G4P GUI elements on the window.
        Parameters:
        window - the window to draw the GUI elements on.
        x - the x position within the window for the left edge of the GUI elements.
        y - the y position within the window for the top edge of the GUI elements.
        Returns:
        the vertical height of the GUI elements drawn, in number of pixels.
